{"sql_query": "SELECT d.first_name || ' ' || d.last_name as driver_name, COUNT(t.trip_id) as completed_trips, AVG(t.rating) as avg_rating FROM drivers d LEFT JOIN trips t ON d.driver_id = t.driver_id AND t.trip_status = 'cancelled' AND t.rating IS NOT NULL GROUP BY d.driver_id, d.first_name, d.last_name HAVING COUNT(t.trip_id) > 0 ORDER BY completed_trips DESC LIMIT 10", "explanation": "SQL query for: List drivers with their sum of cancelled trips and average rating", "category": "aggregation_with_joins", "tables_used": ["trips", "drivers"]}
